verses:
A psalm for David himself.  The Lord hath reigned, let the people
be angry:  he that sitteth on the cherubims:  let the earth be moved.
The lord is great in Sion, and high above all people.

Let them give praise to thy great name:  for it is terrible and
holy:

And the king's honour loveth judgment.  Thou hast prepared
directions:  thou hast done judgment and justice in Jacob.

Exalt ye the Lord our God, and adore his footstool, for it is
holy.

Moses and Aaron among his priests:  and Samuel among them that
call upon his name.  They called upon the Lord, and he heard them:

He spoke to them in the pillar of the cloud.  They kept his
testimonies, and the commandment which he gave them.

Thou didst hear them, O Lord our God:  thou wast a merciful God to
them, and taking vengeance on all their inventions.

Exalt ye the Lord our God, and adore at his holy mountain:  for
the Lord our God is holy.
